title: svAmi ItaramA
sahitya:
svAmi ItaramA shivakumAra subrahmaNya dIna sharaNya


anupallavi

  tAmarai malarp-pAdamE tanjam ena santatam paNiyum enmIdEn parAmukham


caraNam    pArugakirkkoru bhAramAi pApaa shumai AdhAramAi pAsha nirai mana vikAramAi
 pAril uzhala viTTAi yArukkorum oru upakAramilai unakkATpaDu nanneri shEravillai
 innumenai ATTi vaippadiloru vinOdamA umai mainda kanda
